description: Enhanced tool to concatenate folder contents into markdown format for LLM consumption

script: Write-Host 'Installation failed. Please ensure Python and pip are properly installed.'
Write-Host 'Uninstallation failed or package was not found.'

post_install: # Create batch file wrapper for folder2md command
Write-Host "Created folder2md command wrapper at: $batchFile" -ForegroundColor Green
Write-Host '  folder2md . --output output.md    # Process current directory'
Write-Host '  python -m folder2md4llms.cli      # Alternative direct access'

autoupdate.note: This package is installed via pip and will be updated automatically when the version changes

notes: This package requires Python 3.11 or higher to be installed.
The package is installed via pip and managed by Python's package system.
To update manually, run: python -m pip install --upgrade folder2md4llms
